com.markussecundus.forms.gfx

Interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, GraphicalPrimitive<Rend,Pos,Scalar>, UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAbstractDrawableElem, BasicAbstractLayout, BasicGridLayout, BasicLabel, BasicLinearLayout, BasicRectangle, BasicRectangle.SObrubou, BasicRectangle.SRelativniObrubou, BasicRenderer.ShapeToBasicDrw, BinaryGraphicalComposite, BinaryGraphicalComposite.Obruba, BinaryGraphicalComposite.RelativniObruba, DummyDrawableElem, ImageIcon, ImageIcon.Plain, PrimitivePositionalLayout, RoundedRectangle, RoundedRectangle.SObrubou, RoundedRectangle.SRelativniObrubou, Slider, Slider.Basic, TextureDrawable

    public interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
    Základní rozhraní pro cokoliv, co má nějaké rozměry a lze to vykreslit.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    DrawableElem, GraphicalPrimitive

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean draw(Rend renderer, Pos position)
      Called each frame, renders the Drawable on the screen.
      default Pos getSize()
      Shinier shortcut for calling size().get().
      VectUtil<Pos,?> getVectUtil()
      Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.
      ReadonlyProperty<Pos> size()
      The ammount of place the drawable object takes when rendered.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        boolean draw(Rend renderer,
             Pos position)
        Called each frame, renders the Drawable on the screen.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The instance of Rend using which the Drawable is to be rendered
        position - The position on which the Drawable is supposed to be drawn. By convention should define the leftmost-downmost edge of the rectangle circumscribed to the this if in 2D space

      • getVectUtil

        VectUtil<Pos,?> getVectUtil()
        Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.

      • size

        ReadonlyProperty<Pos> size()
        The ammount of place the drawable object takes when rendered.

      • getSize

        default Pos getSize()
        Shinier shortcut for calling size().get().
